trans-unit.source: Represents a safe handle to the Windows registry.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Windows 注册表中的安全句柄。

trans-unit.source: You can use platform invoke on the native `RegCreateKeyEx` Windows function to obtain a <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeRegistryHandle> object, and then use it to create registry keys with the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.FromHandle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用平台调用在本机上`RegCreateKeyEx`Windows 函数来获取<xref:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeRegistryHandle>对象，并使用它创建注册表项与<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.FromHandle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接释放类型，调用其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>中的方法`try` / `catch`块。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分<xref:System.IDisposable>接口主题。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the pre-existing handle to use.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，它表示要使用的预先存在的句柄的。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to reliably release the handle during the finalization phase; <see langword="false" /> to prevent reliable release.
trans-unit.target: 若要在终止阶段可靠地释放此句柄，则为 <see langword="true" />；若要阻止可靠释放，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeRegistryHandle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeRegistryHandle" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。
